Class javachart.chart.StackBarChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.BarChart
                   |
                   +----javachart.chart.StackBarChart
public class StackBarChart
extends BarChart
A chart that represents data with horizontal bars. Multiple Datasets are stacked, one upon another, and each Dataset is drawn in a color defined by the Dataset Gc.

StackBarChart()
constructs a default chart
StackBarChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
StackBarChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class

StackBarChart 
  public StackBarChart()
constructs a default chart
StackBarChart 
  public StackBarChart(String s)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
Parameters:
s - chart name
StackBarChart 
  public StackBarChart(String s,
                       Graphics g)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class
Parameters:
s - chart name
g - Graphics class to use
